categories: Category:Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure actors
Category:Ewoks: The Battle for Endor actors

nodes.text: Eric Walker (born January 31, 1970) is a former child actor who played Mace Towani in Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure (1984) and Ewoks: The Battle for Endor (1985). He has since become a writer and electronic musician; His first album contains the song "Return to Endor", inspired by the Ewok films.
